trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current component.
DataSourceConverter provides methods that can be used to retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current design-time component.
This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data sources in the **Properties** window.
> [!CAUTION] > You should never access a type converter directly.
Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter"></xref> class.
Gets a value indicating whether the converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
As implemented in this class, this method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that can be used to support localization features.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the specified object after conversion.
The conversion could not be performed.
Gets the standard data sources accessible to the control.

The data sources that are accessible to the component are determined by retrieving a list of components from the designer, testing each component with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method, and then returning the components that are valid data sources.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> indicating the component or control to get values for.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> listing the standard accessible data sources.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is a list of all possible values.
If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.
If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of all possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
As implemented in this class, this method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the converter supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source for this converter.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method uses the IsValidDataSource method to determine the components that are available as standard accessible data sources.

For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter> class, a valid data source is a component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
The component to check as a valid data source.
if component implements or ; otherwise, .
